burst.line: <font size="10.5">Explore the REAL universe with WALL-E</font>

subsection.copyVar:
The highly acclaimed director of Finding Nemo and the creative storytellers behind Cars and Ratatouille transport you to a galaxy not so far away for a new cosmic comedy adventure about a determined robot named WALL•E.

After hundreds of lonely years of doing what he was built for, the curious and lovable WALL•E discovers a new purpose in life when he meets a sleek search robot named EVE. Join them and a hilarious cast of characters on a fantastic journey across
the universe.

Transport yourself to a fascinating new world with Disney • Pixar's latest adventure, now even more astonishing on DVD and Blu-ray Hi-def and loaded with bonus features, including the exclusive animated short film BURN•E. WALL•E is a film your family will want to enjoy over and over again.

• "BURN-E"
    • A Hilarious, All-New Animated Short
    Bringing Light To The Galaxy... Eventual-E
  • "Presto"
    • An Amazing Animated Theatrical Short Film
  • Deleted Scenes

  • Animation Sound Design: Building Worlds From The Sound Up
    • Legendary Sound Designer Ben Burtt Shares Secrets Of Creating The Sounds Of WALL-E
  • Audio Commentary
    • With Director Andrew Stanton
  • Sneak Peek: WALL-E's Tour Of The Universe
    • WALL-E Takes You On A Real Ride Through Space
    ONLY AVAILABLE ON 3-DISC SPECIAL EDITION:
  • "The Pixar Story" By Leslie Iwerks
    • An Award-Winning Filmmaker Tells The Riveting Story Of The Innovative Company That Revolutionized Hollywood
  • BnL Shorts
    • An Amusing Peek Into The Inner Workings Of The Buy n Large Corporation
  • WALL-E's Treasures And Trinkets
    • Hilarious Moments
  • Bot Files
    • Get To Know WALL-E's Robot Friends
  • "Lots Of Bots" Storybook
    • This Imaginative Storybook Comes To Life Loaded With Fun Games
  • "Making Of" Featurettes

  • Additional Deleted Scenes

    • ONLY AVAILABLE ON 3-DISC SPECIAL EDITION: TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
    May Only Apply to Feature Film

  • Dolby Digital 5.1 and 2.0 Surround Sound
  • Original Theatrical Aspect Ratio
    •

NEW ONLY ON BLU-RAY:
  • "Burn-E" With Boards
    • Hilarious, All-New Animated Short With Picture-In-Picture Presentation By Director Angus MacLane
  • Cine-Explore
    • With Director Andrew Stanton
  • Geek Track
    • Commentary Provided By Pixar's Biggest Geeks
  • The Axiom Arcade
    • Video Games With A WALL-E Twist
  • 3-D Set Fly-Throughs
    • See Film Locations From A Whole New Angle
  • BD Live (US Only)
    • PLUS ALL DVD FEATURES INCLUDING:
  • "Presto"
    • Amazing Animated Theatrical Short Film
  • "The Pixar Story" By Leslie Iwerks
    • An Award-Winning Filmmaker Tells The Riveting Story Of The Innovative Company That Revolutionized Hollywood
  • Animation Sound Design: Building Worlds From The Sound Up
    • Legendary Sound Designer Ben Burtt Shares Secrets Of Creating The Sounds Of WALL-E
  • "Lots Of Bots" Storybook
    • This Imaginative Storybook Comes To Life Loaded With Fun Games
  • BnL Shorts
    • An Amusing Peek Into The Inner Workings Of The Buy n Large Corporation
  • Audio Commentary
    • With Director Andrew Stanton
  • Sneak Peek - WALL-E's Tour Of The Universe

  • WALL-E's Treasures And Trinkets
    • Hilarious Moments
  • "Making Of" Featurettes

  • Deleted Scenes
    • ONLY AVAILABLE ON 3-DISC SPECIAL EDITION: BLU-RAY TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS FEATURE:
  • 1080p High Definition / 2.39:1
